result.html: Cá bhfuil an siopa bréagánWhere is the toy shop?
result.ponchtml: Cá ḃfuil an siopa bréagánWhere is the toy shop?

result.eng: We'll close the shop if necessary.
result.ga: Dúnfaidh muid an siopa más gá
result.orig: Dúnfaidh muid an siopa más gá
result.html: Dúnfaidh muid an siopa más gáWe'll close the shop if necessary.
result.ponchtml: Dúnfaiḋ muid an siopa más gáWe'll close the shop if necessary.

result.eng: You will see the shop on the right.
result.ga: Feicfidh tú an siopa ar dheis
result.orig: Feicfidh tú an siopa ar dheis
result.html: Feicfidh tú an siopa ar dheisYou will see the shop on the right.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ tú an siopa ar ḋeisYou will see the shop on the right.

result.eng: The shop is only half a mile from my house.
result.ga: Níl an siopa ach leathmhíle ó mo theach
result.orig: Níl an siopa ach leathmhíle ó mo theach
result.html: Níl an siopa ach leathmhíle ó mo theachThe shop is only half a mile from my house.
result.ponchtml: Níl an siopa aċ leaṫṁíle ó mo ṫeaċThe shop is only half a mile from my house.

result.html: Tá an siopa ar oscailtThe shop is open.
result.ponchtml: Tá an siopa ar oscailtThe shop is open.

result.eng: I've been working in this shop for three years.
result.ga: Tá mé ag obair sa siopa seo le trí bliana
result.orig: Tá mé ag obair sa siopa seo le trí bliana
result.html: Tá mé ag obair sa siopa seo le trí blianaI've been working in this shop for three years.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag obair sa siopa seo le trí blianaI've been working in this shop for three years.

result.eng: There are plenty of shops and a supermarket there also.
result.ga: Tá neart siopaí ann agus tá ollmhargadh ann freisin
result.orig: Tá neart siopaí ann agus tá ollmhargadh ann freisin
result.html: Tá neart siopaí ann agus tá ollmhargadh ann freisinThere are plenty of shops and a supermarket there also.
result.ponchtml: Tá neart siopaí ann agus tá ollṁargaḋ ann freisinThere are plenty of shops and a supermarket there also.

result.ga: Tá sé in aice leis an siopa
result.orig: Tá sé in aice leis an siopa
result.html: Tá sé in aice leis an siopaIt is near the shop.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé in aice leis an siopaIt is near the shop.

result.eng: I work from nine o'clock until one o'clock in the bookshop.
result.ga: Oibrím óna naoi a chlog go dtí a haon a chlog sa siopa leabhar
result.orig: Oibrím óna naoi a chlog go dtí a haon a chlog sa siopa leabhar

result.ponchtml: Oibrím óna naoi a ċlog go dtí a haon a ċlog sa siopa leaḃarI work from nine o'clock until one o'clock in the bookshop.

result.eng: What about buying something in Standún's Shop or in the Craft Village in An Spidéal?

result.eng: I like the Aran sweaters that are available in Standún's Shop.
result.ga: Is maith liom na geansaithe Árann atá le fáil i siopa Standúin
result.orig: Is maith liom na geansaithe Árann atá le fáil i siopa Standúin

result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom na geansaiṫe Árann atá le fáil i siopa StandúinI like the Aran sweaters that are available in Standún's Shop.

result.eng: They are in the back of the shop.
result.ga: Tá siad i gcúl an tsiopa
result.orig: Tá siad i gcúl an tsiopa
result.html: Tá siad i gcúl an tsiopaThey are in the back of the shop.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad i gcúl an tsiopaThey are in the back of the shop.

result.eng: There are excellent facilities there. There are good shops there, a post office, schools, a bank and a swimming pool.
